backend/main.mo: Defines data types and in‑memory maps for users, posts, comments, notifications, and conversations with mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests related to adding an app version constant and displaying it in the UI.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend component purposes, routing, styling, and admin tools.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style variables defining OKLCH color themes, dark mode tokens, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML root document loading the React application entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Query and TanStack Router with authenticated routes for main app pages and admin tools.
frontend/src/components/admin/FeatureFla: Admin panel allowing toggling of feature flags with loading, error, and success handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/PostModera: Admin interface for listing and deleting posts with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/SupportIss: Stub panel indicating support issue management is unavailable due to missing backend methods.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserModera: Provides an interface for searching users and toggling their verification status, with restrictions on moderating admin accounts.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Root layout rendering header, outlet, mobile navigation, and footer with version display.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Displays a login card allowing users to sign in via Internet Identity, showing loading state during authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Guards routes by requiring authentication and profile setup, showing loading or login screens when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Restricts access to admin/officer roles and shows an access‑denied message for unauthorized users.
Renders a horizontal stories list with a create option and individual story viewers, loading placeholders when fetching.
frontend/src/components/IdeaList.tsx: Empty file placeholder for an idea list component.
frontend/src/components/IdeaSubmissionFo: Empty file placeholder for an idea submission form component.
frontend/src/components/nav/HeaderNav.ts: Displays the main navigation bar with links, notifications, and admin tools based on user role and authentication.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTabBar: Shows a mobile bottom tab bar for navigation, adding a moderation tab for admin/officer users.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Renders a full post card with author info, image, likes, comments, sharing, and optional deletion.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostGrid.t: Displays posts in a clickable grid layout, navigating to individual post pages on selection.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Modal dialog allowing users to edit profile fields and submit updates, with validation and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowBu: Button that toggles between follow, unfollow, or request states using social graph mutations and loading indicators.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowRe: Panel listing pending follow requests with approve/deny actions and requester profile info.
frontend/src/components/profile/Highligh: A horizontal scrollable row showing placeholder highlight circles and an option to add a new one.
frontend/src/components/profile/MediaCon: Admin panel to view and toggle global feature flags for filters and music with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Profile avatar component rendering a user image at various sizes with a default fallback.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Profile creation form collecting username, display name, email, and bio with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/SuperAdm: Super admin panel for giving or removing verification badges with error/success feedback and admin restrictions.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verified: Renders a check-circle badge with optional orange styling for verified users.
frontend/src/components/stories/CreateSt: Component for uploading and previewing an image to create a story, including validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/stories/StoryVie: Displays a fullscreen story viewer with like functionality, error handling, and close controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminModeration.ts: Provides a mutation to set a user's verified status, noting other moderation functions are missing.
frontend/src/hooks/useFeatureFlags.ts: Returns static feature flag values and a mutation stub that throws due to missing backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useFollowRequests.ts: Provides placeholder hooks for follow request fetching and actions, all disabled or throwing due to missing backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Hooks for conversations and messages, including fetching, sending messages, and creating conversations.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Placeholder hooks for notifications that return empty data or throw due to missing backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: React Query hooks for posts with all backend methods stubbed out and disabled, returning empty data or errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfiles.ts: Profile fetch and mutation hooks using the actor API to load and update user profiles with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialGraph.ts: Social graph hooks for followers and following; backend methods are missing so queries are disabled and mutations throw errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Story hooks with only like/unlike implemented via actor; fetching and creation are disabled due to missing backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupport.ts: Support issue hooks with submission, listing, and status update stubs that return empty data or errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and applying global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point configuring React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPortalPage.tsx: Admin portal UI with tabbed panels for user moderation, posts, feature flags, and support issues.
frontend/src/pages/ConversationPage.tsx: Messaging page that loads a peer profile, initializes a conversation, shows messages, and allows sending new ones.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Form page to create a post with caption, optional image upload/preview, validation, and submission via useCreatePost; blocks posting if the user is restricted.
frontend/src/pages/ExplorePage.tsx: Explore page providing user search by username and showing recent posts using PostGrid.
frontend/src/pages/HomeFeedPage.tsx: Displays the home feed with loading/error states, a Stories row, and a list of posts.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Lists user conversations with loading/empty states and supports navigation to individual message threads.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows notifications and pending follow requests with marking-as-read functionality and scrollable list.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single post with image, likes, comments, and actions such as liking, sharing, and commenting.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile page showing user info, posts, follow state, privacy handling, and admin/owner controls.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders the settings page with logout, support navigation, and app version display; clears identity and query cache on logout.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Implements a support form UI with category and description fields but only shows errors since backend submission is not implemented.
frontend/src/types/missing-backend-types: Defines TypeScript interfaces and enums mirroring unimplemented backend types for posts, comments, stories, notifications, and support issues.
frontend/src/utils/postImage.ts: Provides helpers to convert binary image data to blob URLs, revoke URLs, and convert files to Uint8Array for uploads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings using plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and feature definitions for the Instabook app.
